It took 32 years for the Khmer people to build this gigantic temple. It was completed in the twelve century. This temple is dedicated to Hindu god Vishnu. However, later it was used as a Buddhist temple as Cambodia switched religion. This is only one of the temple in the Khmer ancient city of Angor. At that time, Angor is the biggest and most advanced city on earth. A combination of environmental, political, economical, and geological impacts brought it down in the fourteen century. It is a very special place for all people explore and learn the history of Cambodia.
